message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. I understand you may not know the exact value to you, but I'm confident it's worth significantly more than $1000000. I'm willing to give you a substantial discount for being my first customer, but I need to ensure a fair price for myself. I'm offering it to you for $1500000. It's a limited time offer, so please consider this carefully.
